es.ucm.fdi.gaia.recolibry.api

Class RecommenderSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.ucm.fdi.gaia.recolibry.api.RecommenderSystem

  • public class RecommenderSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the main class to make recommender systems. It have to contain an algorithm and a query to works.
